title: How to Make White Onion Puree

steps.headline: Peel the onions and wash them in warm water.
Use a big enough pot to boil the onions.
steps.description: Boil them until they look and feel soft enough for a puree.

steps.headline: Drain the onions of the excess water.
steps.description: Do not discard the water in which the onions boiled because you will need it for the puree.

steps.headline: Place the onions in the blender adding some of the liquid in which the onions boiled.
steps.description: Based on your texture preference add more or less liquid.

steps.headline: After the onions are well blended, pour the puree into a pot.
steps.description: Bring the puree to a boil and add some salt and pepper. You can also add different spices you enjoy in your favorite dishes.
